apilist.title: Detect Scene Changes
apilist.subtitle: Detect scene changes in the input video.

apilist.title: License Plate Recognition
apilist.subtitle: Detects and reads license plates in a video file.

apilist.title: Speech Recognition
apilist.subtitle: Transcribes speech to text from a video or audio file.

apilist.title: Expand Container
apilist.subtitle: Extracts the contents of a container file.

apilist.title: View Document
apilist.subtitle: Converts a document to HTML format for viewing in a Web browser.

apilist.title: Map Coordinates
apilist.subtitle: Map a set of coordinates to a geographical region.

apilist.title: Get Common Neighbors
apilist.subtitle: Finds the common neighbors of the nodes that you specify.

apilist.title: Get Neighbors
apilist.subtitle: Lists the neighbors of one or more specified nodes.

apilist.title: Get Nodes
apilist.subtitle: Lists the nodes in your graph.

apilist.title: Get Subgraph
apilist.subtitle: Returns a subgraph based on a set of nodes that you provide.

apilist.title: Get Shortest Path
apilist.subtitle: Finds the shortest path in the graph between two specified nodes.

apilist.title: Suggest Links
apilist.subtitle: Suggests nodes that a specified node is close to in the graph, but that it does not currently connect to.

apilist.title: Summarize Graph
apilist.subtitle: Returns a summary of what is in the graph.

apilist.title: Barcode Recognition
apilist.subtitle: Detects and decodes 1D and 2D barcodes in an image that you provide.

apilist.title: Image Recognition
apilist.subtitle: Recognizes a known set of corporate logos in an image that you provide.

apilist.title: Anomaly Detection
apilist.subtitle: Detects anomalies inside a given set of data.

apilist.title: Trend Analysis
apilist.subtitle: Discovers significant changes between two groups of records.

apilist.title: Create Classification
apilist.subtitle: Creates objects that support document classification.

apilist.title: Delete Classification
apilist.subtitle: Deletes objects that support document classification.

apilist.title: Retrieve Classification
apilist.subtitle: Retrieves objects that support document classification.

apilist.title: Update Classification
apilist.subtitle: Updates objects that support document classification.

apilist.title: Get Prediction Model Details
apilist.subtitle: Returns details about trained prediction models.

apilist.title: Predict
apilist.subtitle: Runs the prediction model on the provided data.

apilist.title: Recommend
apilist.subtitle: Runs the prediction model on the provided data, and provides desired recommendations.
